Sir '''Antony Sher''' [[Order of the British Empire|KBE]] ([[14 June]] [[1949]] - [[2 December]] [[2021]])<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.bbc.com/news/entertainment-arts-59520117|articlename=Sir Antony Sher: Actor dies of cancer aged 72 |dated=2 December 2021|website=[[BBC]]|accessed=6 December 2021}}</ref> was a South African-born English actor, writer and theatre director who portrayed an older [[Thráin]] in the [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (extended edition)|extended edition]] of ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' only.
